alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Citrus and central Levy Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of Rainbow Lakes Estates to 16 miles southeast of Fowlers Bluff. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chiefland, Fowlers Bluff, Manattee Road, Andrews, Inglis, Otter Creek, Pine Ridge, Lebanon, Citronelle, Crystal Manor and Manatee Springs State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
